case_circumstances: Unidentified black male was found laying on ground in front of a business. Business owner had seen the man the day before sitting on the ground, moving around. He was alive when the business owner left for the day on 8/19. When the business owner returned on 8/20 he noticed the man was not moving, checked on him, and found him deceased. No wallet or identifying features. Track marks present on arms.
case_facial_hair: Full beard and mustache - partially gray
